works.description:
The end is near for the OPI Serena Williams Glam Slam  
Series.

We have seen some great nail polishes from OPI for the Australian Open,  
French Open, Wimbledon, and soon the last of these polishes will be  
released to coincide with the US Open which takes place August 29th to  
September 11th of 2011 in Queens, New York.

For the Australian and French Open we were introduced to some great crackle  
nail polishes and one of a kind nail polish colors: Black Shatter and  
Simply Smash-Ing for Australian Open, Rally Pretty Pink and Red Shatter as  
well as Spark De Triomphe and White Shatter for France. When the Wimbledon  
colors came out there was a shift from shatter polishes to great glitter  
and mica infused polishes. Three colors were released for this series :  
Grape…Set…Match!, Servin Up Sparkle, and Your Royal Shine-Ness.

Now that The US Open is just months away OPI has announced the polishes  
that will be tied into this tournament. There will be two colors : Love Is  
A Racket and Pros & Bronze. Love Is A  Racket is a super shimmery red that  
appears to be Mica infused so it will glisten even when not in sunlight.  
The shade of red looks to be hinted with a bit of an orange-pink so it  
should complement most if not all skin tones. Pros & Bronze is a glitter  
and mica infuse bronze that will look great with that summer tan you worked  
on all summer. Months after that tans fades it will remind you of your  
summer and bring a bit of that summer sun back into your life.
